segments.text: Hey , Trev ! How did the shopping go ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: “ You ain't nothing ' but a hound-dog ... ”
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course I'm OK ! I just bought a bunch of classic Elvis records !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Aren't you lucky . The vintage-clock guy is driving a hard bargain . So I have nothing .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No sweat . Just go back and talk him down . Here comes Wei .
segments.speaker: S2
